website_summaries.verdict: The best gym bag available. Overall construction quality make this gym bag ideal for workouts, sports, and overnight trips.
pros: This gym bag has it all:  compartments for wet and dry items, roomy interior for clothes and equipment, and separate storage for shoes or sundries
Under Armour seems to have thought of everything in this design
cons: One of the more expensive gym bags on the market
Larger shoe sizes may not fit comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits inside most gym lockers
customer_reviews.text: The ideal woman's gym bag. It's large enough to hold what you need and more, but not oversized or bulky. Easily fits inside most gym lockers. Has great pockets and a shoe compartment to make organizing your belongings easy. May gift these to my friends next Christmas because I want to buy more and support the Under Armour Undeniable II duffle bag cause. Attached images show bag held by me (5'8") and beside my shoes for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: coolitbrittneyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: HUGE bag, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge and does exactly what I need it to do. My 13 year old son is 5'8", about 160lbs, the size of many full grown men, and plays tackle football. His helmet (inside his pads), pads, padded pants, cleats, slip on sandals, and a can of antibacterial spray all fit inside this bag beautifully and help keep all of his stinky gear contained. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This duffel bag is a great value. It is quite big and holds a ton of stuff. It also has several convenient compartments. The shoulder strap is very comfortable as well as the hand grips. I have had no issues with the zippers and they seem to be made out of quality materials and function very nicely. I love the design and the color options and thing that this is a very nice bag, especially given the lower price tag. Great for the gym or travel. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Ping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent duffle bag for gym
customer_reviews.text: If you need a new duffle bag, this is for you! The quality of the duffle is great. Much better than the other one I had. Of course that was falling apart after 7 years of use. The bag has a lot of room. Probably bigger than I need but worth it. Now I can carry all my stuff to the gym, including bath stuff if I shower there. Plenty of pockets but they should more on the inside. Otherwise plenty of room. Love the shoulder strap which has rubber to keep it from moving. Hard bottom to keep stuff from getting damaged when set on the floor. Love the brand and will continue to buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: D & C Wietor

customer_reviews.title: Good Crossfit bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the wife's gym bag. She would immediately correct me and say "box" as she cross fits. As you know the first and only rule of cross-fit is to tell EVERYONE that you a part of cross-fit. She is able to carry her lifters, inhaler, protein powder, shaker bottles, weight lifting belt, jump rope, water, change of pants (because unless you pee yourself you evidently did not push yourself), and plenty of room for more stuff to be really good at working out and talking about it. The bag is durable and looks good too (I am sure that is the biggest deal to her).
customer_reviews.author: Wigglebutt

customer_reviews.title: small size is good.
customer_reviews.text: This duffel bag is enough to fit a soccer ball and soccer shoes etc. If you want to use this bag for soccer, small size is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The bag is beautiful BUT the description on the measurements is wrong. According to UA website, this should be a SMALL(21inches long) and not a Medium(25inches long) Please update listing and price. I wanted a medium and I ordered 2, both came the same 21 inch instead of 25.
customer_reviews.author: Claudinne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bag for basketball. Easily fits water bottles, 2 basketballs, keys. electronics and odds and ends like a knee brace, spare insoles and an air pump kit. My favorite feature by far is the padding on the shoulder strap, it's only about a 5 minute walk to the outdoor basketball courts but a weighty bag can dig into a shoulder quickly, this one is pure comfort. Seems to be holding up well under the stress.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: HUGE and Hold everything even kitchen sink! hahaha
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very large, so be aware that it's large enough to put a pair of football shoulder pads, a helmet,, and all other gear football player needs in one bag!!!! Made well and my boys love them,, they all have one for their stuff and they take them to school every day for practice and such. Love UA Duffle Bags!!!
customer_reviews.author: OnFleakInk/Artistry

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this bag was better than I expected! Great quality product. Very vibrant red in color. The bag has plenty of room for any adult to use, but I actually bought it for my 7 year old son and he loves to tote this to his basketball games/practices carrying inside- his sneakers, slide sandals, basketball, baseball cap, extra clothes/jacket, water bottle and still has room to spare. We love the vented shoe compartment. All the compartments are very nice to help any age athlete keep all their gear organized. We also really like the shoulder strap/handle strap option. Extremely pleased with this purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for small duffle bag
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say this is a decent duffle bag. The separate compartment for wet items is useful. The design and colors are nice. Even the material and construction is pretty good. The major issue I have is the price for the bag. For around $40 I couldn't justify keeping it, especially since this is the smallest duffle offered by UA. I decided to buy a different brand's small sport duffle with comparable specs and at HALF the cost. I love UA products, but have to pass on this one ... unless I can find it on sale in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mplsgirl

customer_reviews.title: I toss it in my car and keep it pretty stuffed running to and from the gym
customer_reviews.text: Using it now for over a year. I toss it in my car and keep it pretty stuffed running to and from the gym. The material is still in good shape with no tears. The stitching was good and the zippers have lasted. It would be a full five stars if the shoe storage area was a bit larger. As it is, if you wear bigger than a size 12, you are probable out of luck and will need to just toss them in the main storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This bag can fit a large amount of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my wife who is a personal trainer. She is always carrying around client books, multiple changes of clothing, ready-to-eat prep meals, etc. This bag ended up being perfect. It's huge! After a year of being tossed around, dragged across floors, and stuffed to its max, I can honestly say that it looks as good as new. The stitching is perfectly intact after multiple washes and the color has not faded at all. When we traveled to the Dominican Republic a few months ago my wife stuffed this bag with multiple items and used it as her carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching on the strap
customer_reviews.text: Update.... Contacted the seller Zappos to see what they will do since UA wants to take a month to send me a girt card. The shoulder strap has broken and I use this bag very little really. Not sure what Amazon and Under Amour will do to replace a strap that's been used so little. The bag is still like new and the strap stitching is just falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: 40M

customer_reviews.title: NICE DUFFLE BAG BUT STARTED RIPPING AWAY AT THE SEAMS IN 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: It's a real bummer. This isn't a cheap duffle bag yet my husband thought he just HAD to have it to take to football practice (he's a coach). He doesn't misuse it, mishandle it, or anything out of the ordinary and the bag has already started ripping away at the seams. He'd only had it for two months by the time that started happening. He's very disappointed. And I am, too.. That's a lot of money to spend on a duffle bag for a name brand that you expect to trust for good quality. I wish we could get it replaced. =/
customer_reviews.author: Coastie Wife20

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for weekend trips out of town
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my son to use when we take weekend trips, and he loves it. He's very particular about color, so I was thrilled to find this light blue, which is very close to his favorite shade. So far we've taken it on a couple of weekend trips out of town, and it's been perfect for him. We've managed to fit three days' worth of winter clothes and toiletries in the bag, which means we could probably fit more in the summer. It is a bit of a tight fit to get that much in, but the seams and zipper have held up well and we're very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: and does not seem like it will be durable enough to handle being stuffed ...
customer_reviews.text: Handle from bag frequently restrict zipper when trying to zip or unzip making it frustrating to use. The fabric is very thin making it hard to zip and unzip, and does not seem like it will be durable enough to handle being stuffed into a locker or thrown into a trunk multiple times. Very thin and flimsy shoulder strap, not large enough to support a bag of this size. With that being said, I'm sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bojanowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for pickleball
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It holds my workout clothes, athletic shoes, pickleball paddle, and other pickleball gear quite nicely. I use the shoe compartment to hold pickleballs. The bag has a great print that really pops and stands out in the "crowd" of single-color duffle bags. The only drawback is that there's really no way to keep a drink bottle upright in transit. But otherwise, I see myself getting years of use out of this as both a gym bag and a weekend travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bookbean

customer_reviews.title: It's really quite fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I really do love it. It fits in the long lockers at my university gym (I hang it by the cloth handle on the end), and has a nice and big pocket for shoes. I wear a women's size 8 and can fit both ballet flats and my five fingers in it easily. There is a little felt zipped pocket in the main opening, which is great for dropping my watch and earrings in--probably the most simple aspect that I like best. The side pocket fits more than expected, and overall, I can put it everything I need to go to the pool, shower, and get dressed afterwards all in this little thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great weekend/anytime bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great !!! And priced great. I do a lot of weekend traveling and in the northeast you never know what kind of weather your gonna get (I tend to overpack) so this bag fits a lot of clothes. It has a big front pocket and a huge side compartment (a descent compartment on the other side with a mesh material good for storing papers/magazines ) a wallet sized pouch on the inside. Has a shoulder strap as well as handles. It's a great travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: M Bunero

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bag. It was slightly larger than I expected but not to worry, I will "fill it up". The price was excellent and the vendor surprised me by shipping it via Priority Mail. It actually arrived a week early. That pleased me greatly as I needed it desperately. I would use this vendor again and so far I really like the bag. Looks like it will last a lot longer than my Lands End bag and it lasted over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the car or an overnight
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, I love the shoe pocket. This is just the right size for a change of gym clothes and shoes, there's a nice mesh picket for quick grab items, a side zip, and a nice Large front pocket. There's a carabineer for your keys or a waterbottle. It's not quite big enough for gym clothes/ shoes and a basketball but it's perfect to leave in the car in case you need a change of clothes or a small weekend/ over night bag. Very high quality material and I feel that it'll last for a quote a long time. I've been using this bag daily for 2 months and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: One BIG bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge. I was hesitant to buy a smaller bag in fear that my size 12 shoes would not fit. I ran across this bag and jumped on it. My shoes seem very small in this bag! I probably could fit my 8 year old in it (not that I would even try). Seriously, if space is what you need in a gym bag, this one will give you plenty it has zipper pockets on each end and one along the side. There is also a small zipper pouch on the inside, maybe for keys and wallet. Durability is great as I have transported 50lbs of supplies in it without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: WIN!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these medium duffel bags for 8 and 11 year olds. They were able to pack a week's worth of clothing, shoes, boots, jackets, blankets, scarves and everything else they needed for cold weather vacation. These bags are perfectly sized and I'm sure the kiddos will get years of use out of each bag. We did buy the large size for the teenager and he had plenty of room leftover for his stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great durable bag for my kids' sports
customer_reviews.text: This is a great durable bag for my kids' sports. We can fit a lot of gear in there. He plays LAX so we can get all of his pads and even his helmet in. The price is a little high but that's of course for the Under Armour label. I read other reviews for bags about $10 cheaper and I'm glad I went with this one based on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M.

customer_reviews.title: No detachable shoulder straps
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in the quality of the bag. Specifically the shoulder straps should be detachable. Not only for convenience sake but also for durability. I have no doubt the right side will fail as a result of stress from weight in the bag. With the medium duffle bag being only $5 more, it is clear Under Armour designed and priced this bag for a higher profit.
customer_reviews.author: debraf

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for swimming!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this medium bag for swimming. Although it is a bit bigger than I thought, in the end it worked out perfectly because I can throw my wet suit and towel in a laundry bag and stuff the whole thing in this duffle without any effort. I have my clothes, toiletries, goggles, shoes, etc.., in the bag too - no problem. The bag is so light that even with all my stuff in it I do not feel it is too heavy or bulky. Oh and a neat little feature is a plastic key ring on the front, I keep my lock hung on it and it is right there when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana T

customer_reviews.title: Cool and functional—Life is good
customer_reviews.text: Fifth grader loves this bag. It is the red combo the boys are wearing in their coats and athletic clothes. We could not decide which size would be best for carrying boots and snow pants. Picked the medium to accommodate the boots. Boots work well, but I’m not sure the bag will fit into a half-locker next year. The quality is what I expect from UA.
customer_reviews.author: Bettendorf IA Grandmom Jane

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as durable as it could be if the carry straps were secured all the way around the bag instead of to the base on one side, and the top seam on the other. The seam is opening up, and the strap on that side will soon fail. I have now located a bag which is much more durable, at a lesser price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but Bigger Than I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag in blue. It was really well constructed and good quality. However, it is HUGE. I ended up returning it because I completely underestimated how big it would be. I only needed a bag to use for the gym and maybe as a weekend bag once in a while. The large duffel is the kind of thing you would pack for a long vacation or some serious sports equipment. I returned the large duffel and ordered a small and it is the perfect size for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: RayTanf

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Stylish, Loads of Room
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with the quality of the materials. I've had it for several months now and there are no obvious signs of wearing. I've had some nice comments about the style of the bag. Stores way more than I would have expected. I'm used to my gym bags tearing fairly quickly, with straps that are uncomfortable and which struggle to support the weight of the items I carry. This one is made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag! I've had nike, PINK Duffle, Addidas and other gym bags. I like this one second to nike because its affordable and has structure to it! It even comes with a band to keep your bag compact and folded when not in use. I carry a lot of training equipment to the gym that has weight. I use this bag to bring my resistance bands, ankle straps, 12pound weighted vest, gym sneakers and a extra pair of clothes. My sneakers and sports bottle even fits! No post gym smell either. Will post a updated review, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Themelabody

customer_reviews.title: The Large size is huge
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the size, but this thing is huge. Not too big, but close. The shoe compartment is large enough to fit a pair of size 12 boots. Boots. I said Boots. And not like "ankle" style boots, I mean real boots. Great for military, firefighters, hockey players, etc. Alternatively, I was also able to stuff my sneakers, and a full set of dirty workout clothes in there without a problem. Very well designed, pockets right where you want them. Very comfortable shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Handy, strong, and very cool looking bag
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson needed this duffle bag for an overnight school trip. UA is his favorite brand so the bag was perfect in black with a blue insignia, lots of well located pockets, strong zipper, detachable shoulder strap as well as a smaller carrying handle. No doubt this duffle bag will be used a lot and will hold up well as the bag is made with strong material and looks cool besides. Great gift, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Grube

customer_reviews.title: Green is bright!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t too sure about the color when I was ordering it. Sometimes items are not as pictured. This was not the case at all. The item was exactly as pictured. I have it put away so I can’t take a picture of it but when I pull it out I will update this review. It’s a very decent sized duffel bag. Will work excellent for traveling. Can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Collins

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quality bag. It's my fault that I didn't realize it was going to be too large to fit in the locker at the gym... I went with the smaller one and couldn't be happier :-) If you have a lot of sports gear or are going on a vacation this is a great duffel bag. I honestly think it this bag could fit more than my large suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: BAE

customer_reviews.title: Great size for internal pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great size for internal pocket. You can easily get your work clothes or gym clothes in here with towels, workout and warmup gear, toiletries. One star taken off for the shoe pocket being tiny (I wear men's 11 and can barely cram one pair of running shoes into it, I don't even try to get my Powerlifts into it, I just put my shoes in the main pocket and put everything else on top of them) and the fact that the shoulder strap is sewn in instead of detachable. Otherwise good bag. If you really like using a shoe pocket I'd get the bigger one or a different bag unless you have small feet.
customer_reviews.author: J Wai

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, just minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and perfect size! 2 end pockets and 1 side pocket are great to have. Lots of space inside. The only complaint I have is that the joints of the shoulder strap are ridiculously squeaky. When walking while using the shoulder strap, they squeak super loudly. Also, the hand strap on one side is a bit too close to the side pocket, making me have to push it out of the way every time I want to unzip it. Overall, a great bag. Word of caution: if you get the high visibility yellow like I did, prepare to have people ask you if you work for CalTrans.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A Crum

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for size 15 shoes and 2 basketballs with room to spare
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized bag. I use it for basketball. It can fit my size 15 shoes and 2 regulation basketballs in the main compartment. My shoes can also squeeze into the side compartment, but I normally use that for my sweaty clothes after a good hoop session. That way they are separated from the rest of my things. I've had this bag for more than a year and a half and it's still in great condition. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phenom

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I got the large bag and it's huge! I use it for a gym bag and have 6 pair of shoes, 2 pair of knee sleeves, wrist wraps and a weight belt in there and still have tons and tons of room! The shoulder strap is a bit long but I adjusted it and it seems just fine. Awesome bag. Will be ordering one for my son for his football gear. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: armywife

customer_reviews.title: Great duffel bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old to take to camp. It fit a weeks worth of clothes, his swim trunks, two towels, an extra pair of shoes, and all his toiletries plus sunscreen. Didn't even have to use front pocket. I was so pleased with this duffel. Will be using for all for a while
customer_reviews.author: Liz Raines

customer_reviews.title: Love this duffel bag for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I have been really happy with the Under Armour medium duffel. They are quite roomy, have several pockets and are fairly sturdy. It does not collapse in on itself. It has a nice side pouch which is handy for slipping in a pair of sandals, slippers, etc. It is my new favorite brand for duffel bags. I have bought several over the past couple of years and have slowly been replacing some of our other ones.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperB

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to use for the gym and he's very happy with it. It's very roomy for his gym clothes, his sneakers, water bottle and towel with room to spare. We also just took a mini vacation and my husband was able to pack several days of clothes easily in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: PR_SG

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Definitely a medium. My 8 year old use it for his 5 day church camp. Everything fit well. Two towels 2 pairs of shoes, clothes for 5 days and snacks. As you can imagine the bag was filthy since they were in a wooded area. Washed it in cold water delicate cycle no spin with light detergent. Since the bag is water resistant it collected water on the inside. So after draining all the excess water from the pocketed areas I hung it upside down and let it air dry. Looks good as new.
customer_reviews.author: ZCollins

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of the bag and the additional compartments. The shoe compartment is smaller as a wear a lady's size 9 shoe and find myself squishing the shoes in there. It is nice to put a towel and swimsuit after swimming. It also does take up a large portion of the inside of the bag. Would probably go with a medium however it does work for the gym. Overall good quality of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: WIPA88

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and a Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for a new gym bag for some time now. I actually purchased a Nike bag however it was very flimsy and not well made so I returned it. I then Purchased the Under Armor Storm bag at it is Perfect! Much better quality than the Nike bag for sure. Holds all of my gym stuff as well as my Sneakers.. has side pockets which I think are great to have for my drinks etc.... I would highly recommend this bag to everyone I know as well as those of you I don't know!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Was the size they said and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for all my martial arts clothing and pads. I can fit a chest protector, helmet, arm pads, shin guards, tabi shoes, entire Gi, and have room for my kids stuff as well. Only thing that's a slight drawback...has large zip up pockets on each side that can hold a ton of stuff. The side pockets - if you stuff them full, do take up space on the inside of the bag. That's the only thing I'd recommend they change on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Like others have pointed out, bag measures 21 inches wide, NOT 25. Also does not have "armour" lettering on the underside as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: 21" does not equal 25"
customer_reviews.text: As a guy, as much as I wish I could add 4" to everything and call it true, the real world doesn't work like that. What you pay for is a 25" bag but what you really get (much like another reviewer) is a 21" with a tag that it claims to be a medium sized 25" bag. Also just messing with it to see if I'd like it if it was actually the right size, the zipper on the large outer pocket is catchy and doesn't easily open and close. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag. It is sturdy and very well made. I bought it for my daughter to use for dance class. Her baton fits perfectly and all of her clothes as well. You won't go wrong by purchasing this bag. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a great bag. My only minor complaint is that the shoulder strap is too long. I'm 6' 2" and with the strap fully tightened, it still hangs below my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: These bags are the perfect size for my high school and middle school football ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the perfect size for my high school and middle school football players. I am divorced and the kids travel between houses. These bags hold shoulder pads, helmets, and all of the other pads and football needs. There is enough room for my smaller guy and my bigger guy. The straps adjust, so the shorter of the two has his shorter to meet his needs. Great purchase. So glad we found these. And the price can't be beat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kjhscol72

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large gym bag, and this bag is exactly what I was looking for! I am able to fit everything necessary, to get dressed for work, into this bag: shower items, hair items, make-up bag, shoes/boots, and work clothes. I do not have to cram anything, and it zips with ease. No more having to walk into the gym with a bag crammed full and unable to zip.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn B

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Great Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the bag. It looks great and seems well constructed. Using it for football equipment for a person who wears adult medium pads, adult large helmet and size 13 mens shoes. All equipment, including helmet, fits inside main compartment and zips closed.
customer_reviews.author: A.Long.225

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. The small size is the best size for what I need, which is bigger than what I currently have. I was in between the small or medium but I am glad I got the small. I go to the gym at work everyday and all I need to carry is my gym clothes, towel, make up, and a few extra things. They all fit and I have plenty of room left. (I leave a few other things at the locker such as my shoes). Would totally recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag, Larger Than You Would Expect
customer_reviews.text: This bag has served me well. It works great as a gym bag, even though it is a bit large for my gym needs. If this is the small bag, I can't imagine what the large would look like. I used this bag for a week-long trip and I was able to fit 8 shirts, 8 pairs of underwear, 8 undershirts, 2 pairs of cargo shorts, 2 pairs of thick jeans, a pair of cotton jersey shorts, 7 pairs of socks, and my shaving kit all in the main compartment. There was little room to spare, but it has held together perfectly and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag for young and old
customer_reviews.text: We love this bag! I bought this bag for my son for overnight camp and it fit one week of clothing (plus a heavy sweatshirt, jacket, and 2 pairs of shoes) for my 12-year-old perfect! We got the silver and black color and it's very nice, lots of pockets, and zippers are smooth. My husband has now taken over the bag for working out lol. I'd definitely buy another one for my younger son.
customer_reviews.author: GIJane

customer_reviews.title: Size is great.... but
customer_reviews.text: Size is great.... but I expected a few more (little) things. The thickness of the material is less than I expected. The Photo does suggests a more robust thickness. Well, not so much. I expected a double zipper . I didn't show it in the picture. Just thought by now that would be std. issue. I guess not. And a slightly annoying ~feature~... the handles seem a bit too long for my liking. So, what is good? The bag is plenty bif.
customer_reviews.author: Frank-in-SanDiego

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Great quality, nice look. I use it to carry gym clothes and accessories (shoes, basketball, bag gloves, hand wraps, etc.) The only thing I don't like about it is the shoulder strap is attached to plastic loops with plastic hooks, so they squeak when you walk with a lot of weight in the bag. I'm going to try putting some electrical tape on the loops to see if that stops the squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I use it 4-5 days a week. It holds all my stuff. Gym clothes, accessories (belt, gloves, clips etc.) also holds my supplements and my meals (I carry 4 meals to work) and all my shaker bottles (I carry 3 of those). Well worth the money. Will be buying a new one probably in summer to give this one a break. Everyone loves the polka dots too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a smaller workout bag and loves Under Armour so we tried this one. It is well-constructed and is exactly what he was looking for from a size standpoint. You can easily fit a pair of shoes, protein shaker, clothes, etc. in this bag and it doesn't look like your moving into the gym for the week. It also looks really great. I'd recommend it very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Lag

customer_reviews.title: Love this sturdy bag!
customer_reviews.text: This has a LOT of room for a small duffle. I am very pleased with it. Very sturdy material and zipper. I have had other brands of duffle bags but my Under Armour bags always last the longest. I can tell this is high quality like my other Under Armour bags. I can fit my gym gear [gloves, belt, earphones, etc.], workout clothes, sneakers, water bottle or two, and other items. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend says all the time that this was the best Christmas gift he ever got! I've used it a few times myself. It's HUGE inside! I love the part where you can fit your shoes inside. This is kind of big- just so you know- it's not a small duffle bag. But it fits a ton of stuff in there- I took it on a girls weekend and it held all my stuff. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. It fits all of my son's lacrosse gear. It has an extra pouch for his mouthguard. Awesome very happy he likes it. Makes my life better. It def. Fits his lacrosse helmet, chest pads, arm pads, cleats, drink, and extra clothes. He always carries his stick, so I was looking for a bag that fit his gear but not a huge duffel bag.. I'm glad I bought it. The color is perfect , masculine. I think it's well made. Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for someone who wants to carry a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big enough to fit a couple days worth of clothes. I have an office job that allows for sandals and shorts year round but I need to have dress clothes, jeans, and boots if I have to go out to a job site. I also keep gym clothes in it for quick stops to the gym on the way home. I took the boots out and leave them in the car to take some weight out. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gears

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the gym! I keep my workout and swim gear in there 24/7 (which consists of a fitness hr monitor, 2 pairs of sneakers, 2 jump ropes, head phones, a 32 oz water bottle, a beach towel and goggles) and still have enough room to throw a spare change of winter clothes (including thick sweaters) in there. Also I go ham at the gym so the separate vented pocket is perfect for putting my dirty gym clothes in!!! The only reason I give it 4/5 stars is because the vented pocket could be a little bigger. My gym shoes bearly fit in there and i wear a U.S. mens 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Price / Quality / Design
customer_reviews.text: Cool bag, nice price and perfect size I bought a small one and the size is just perfect. (the small one fits 2 pairs of shoes size 10 + gym shorts + tank top and more). The quality is good, fast delivery and I paid cheap for the bag (ok, I bought on Black Friday). I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Veiga

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Will last!
customer_reviews.text: This a great bag. We bought this for our 8 year old, but can see this bag being with him for years down the road. The quality of the bag will definitely hold up, including the stitching where the straps and handles are. The pockets are great for warm up gear, shoes, a basketball, knee pads, and any other gear that may be needed.
customer_reviews.author: lovelylily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Quality Material, Well-Designed Shoulder Strap, Useless Shoe Compartments
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a perfect size for taking to the gym or for an overnight bag. The shoe compartments on the side are an absolute joke(if that is truly what they are meant for), but I typically wear my shoes to the gym anyway, so it's not the end of the world for a person like me. The shoulder strap is nice, with silicone grips on the shoulder pad so it doesn't slip off. The zipper seems to be good quality so far. Overall, very happy with this bag. I ahwv received several compliments on the bag, so definite kudos on the design!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great weekend bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weekend bag. The bag has two side pockets and a front pocket. I also love the shoulder strap on this bag with the padded spot so it doesn't rub on your shoulder. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because the material feels a little thinner than previous duffle bags I have owned. But I love the pink color and size of this bag! The size 'small' would be a great overnight back but get the medium if you plan on going for more than one night!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It has some type of foam across the bottom so it keeps its form and shape even if you don't have much in it. This has been my daily gym back for about a year now and it looks as good as the day I bought it. You can also toss it in the washing machine if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Ross G.

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: After having this for more than 2 years and using it at the gym it has retained its usability, shape and no tears or threads coming loose. Love this bag! Very lightweight but holds a lot of things; my water bottle on the side, extra pockets for my lock and cell phone, big storage area for clothes, towels, gloves , shoes, etc. Very sturdy and colorful. Doesn't fade. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Pimental

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great bag; I was outside for about an hour in pretty heavy rain and the interior did not get wet at all. The bag was also sitting on wet turf the entire time, which makes me even more impressed. Size-wise, it fits well. This bag can be used to go to the gym or week-long trips. The quality is great. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wa

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag mainly for the gym but it can certainly be used for basically anything. I got it for a great price on amazon and the bad is a legitimately solid item. The price just made it even more of a great purchase. It has the compartments i need and it is very spacious. I would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: (Size: small) Great size for overnight or weekend trips, a bit big for the gym
customer_reviews.text: The small size is perfect for overnight or quick weekend trips. I can fit 2-3 changes of clothes in here with a bathroom bag and a 13" laptop with no issues. It looks high quality, but I've only used it a couple times so far. I also love the side pocket that expands into the bag so you can put a pair of running shoes or sweaty laundry (that pocket is ventilated) without getting everything else dirty
customer_reviews.author: Ben Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag, but quality and design could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent bag, but zippers aren't smooth and poor quality, also the design is missing easily accessible small pocket for phone/keys. There is a small pocket inside the main compartment, but it's too small and very inconvenient: you need to unzip the largest compartment first and if the bag is stuffed, the pocket is still impossible to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Kiyanchuk

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Everyday It fits my 5lb container of protein, pre workout, gloves, size 13 mens shoes, gym shorts, gym shirt, and a few misc items. Granted, all this stuff fits rather snug so most of the time I leave my shoes out of it but it was exactly what I was looking for and has proven so far to be very durable. The white does show dirt fairly easily so keep that in mind when picking your color!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: but the size if perfect my gym clothes and a pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was initially worried that the bag might be too big, but the size if perfect my gym clothes and a pair of shoes. The fabric material feels very thin and flimsy initially, but it is strong enough. I usually carry my laptop, laptop charger, gym clothes and accessories, and shoes. So far, I don't see any tears in the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Omkar Lokare

customer_reviews.title: Potentially one of the best gym bags on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gym bag. You can feel by the quality of it that it won't tear and it's a perfect size for most lockers. It's big enough to hold two pairs of shoes a towel a small shower carousel as well as a change of gym clothes. One of my best purchases this year
customer_reviews.author: Jason N

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, but...
customer_reviews.text: ...I do not like how the shoulder strap is sewn into the bag as opposed to being attached to hooks like on the larger storm undeniable models. It seems like the stitiching will tear easily if the bag has some weight in it. I carry a lot of gym extras in the bag that add extra weight (wraps, straps, bands, etc.), so I hope that it holds up. I will have to use the handle straps more when I put extra things into it. I will definitely be keeping my old medium-sized storm undeniable in case this one tears up.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, likely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Just an overall great bag. Perfect size for my needs. Only complaint is these bags tend to be very expensive and in my opinion, overpriced. But such is Under Armour, right?
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice sizing (I'd say perfect to bring your workout gears ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sizing (I'd say perfect to bring your workout gears to gym), as I bring my own bar pads for squat, a small bag of chalk, workout clothes, underwear, towel and socks. Plus a blender and keychain, wallet, lock, etc. Those things all fit in nicely, and the color is very nice. just one problem, when you wear this, the bag is not in the nice rectangular shape but crushed. But that happens unless this is made with rugged frame or you fill this up completely.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Kim

customer_reviews.title: Traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to traveling bag. I take anywhere from 8-12 trips a year. I have had this bag for more than 3 years and it still is holding up. Still looks brand new. Love it. Have not tested the water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag I used it daily for the gym. Even took it along on a couple of overnight trips. I gave out after a couple of years. Would definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nike Brassilia Bag that lasted nearly three years. However, after a strap broke due to daily wear and tear, I felt like it was time to change up my gym bag selection a little - I was not disappointed with this duffle. I purchased a medium size bag and it fits all of my gym essentials (I.e. Shoes, belt, shaker, wrist wraps, chalk, and lol the other works of a CrossFitt). I also had the opportunity to pack it for a 5 day camping trip. The bag feels durable, looks great, and has a great internal design for storage. I would highly encourage fellow gym goers to look into this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Randall

customer_reviews.title: Bag came with a defect....
customer_reviews.text: After using this bag for the first time I noticed there was a hole where the material was not sewed properly during production (defect). Since I ordered the bag but did not use it immediately, I can no longer return or exchange the bag for another one now that the "return window" has closed. This is really disappointing since the bag came defective but because we didn't use it right away can't exchange it. Otherwise, the bag is really great as far as the pockets and size. Just hope the hole doesn't get any bigger or we would have completely wasted our money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter and she loves it. Great size - much bigger than I anticipated. She is using this as her gym bag, but it's also large enough that she's using it as a weekend bag for trips. Definitely the great quality I would expect from UA and the colors were true to the picture (ordered the tropic pink/graphite).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Big which is nice, cumbersome and awkward to carry if you aren't over 6' tall.
customer_reviews.text: It's big which is good, I use this as my second bag when I swim and I keep my swim gear in it. When I swim, I stick my regular bag in this one and off I go. It would be nice of the straps attached diagonally to the bag due to it size, it's cumbersome and awkward. Holds a lot of gear though.
customer_reviews.author: LA Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Fits my sons gear for football
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Fits my sons gear for football. Put the helmet inside the pads and everything fits very well. Enough room for all the gear, extra clothing and the disinfectant for the gear. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Bag
customer_reviews.text: Received with a large rip. Needed the bag for a trip I was taking, received it the day before I had to leave. So I just threw this bag away and had to go out and buy a new bag so I could use it on my trip. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag and Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I've had it for a while and it's still in great shape. I do a decent job of airing it out, but sometimes I'm a typical man and forget to take out of my sweaty clothes. Even after those times, the inside doesn't smell terrible and I don't bother cleaning it. I use this for the gym and basketball and even over stuffed it with a lot of things when I moved and nothing ever ripped or broke. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very small and design print looks different in real life.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the bag. Very small...the shoe compartment doesn't even fit a pair of shoes. I have to angle them in and force it to zip...and I only wear a size 9.5 men's shoe. I also ordered the blue print one and what looked like a camo design actually looks more leopard print. Feels more for a woman then a men. Very small and be cautious of the design you pick.
customer_reviews.author: Chester629

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag that is bigger the it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, I use it almost everyday to bring my stuff to the Gym. I've owned it for about 3 months now and it still looks brand new even after daily usage. It a pretty good sized back, I've used it several times now to back for a 5 day week in South Carolina. I was able to fit all my cloths for the weekend in just this bag !
customer_reviews.author: Kevin King

customer_reviews.title: Durable bag, perfect size. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag, perfect price! Bought this for my husband for his birthday. It’s much more durable than the nylon bags. Now we both have one. Life is crazy busy, so that bag gets thrown around - the house, car trunk, gym...so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sliva

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Used this on a recent trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Used this on a recent trip to Asia as a carry on bag and had no issues with airport security or any of the airlines I was.
customer_reviews.author: RAGSdale

customer_reviews.title: Medium is a good size for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Medium bag. Large enough for a pair of 16oz boxing gloves, shoes, towel, and a change of clothes. Would also work as an overnight bag with enough room for a change of clothes, shoes, toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: We’ve had for years!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband to use to travel with. Very good quality and also very big in size! The compartments are huge and fit a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AusDarHam

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks well made and is very stylish. It is perfect in carrying my gym cloths and accessories. There is a shoe pouch which is convenient but a bit small for my size 8.5 sneakers. It still fits my sneakers if I slant it. The shoulder strap is well padded making it comfortable to carry. Overall, very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: paul ramcharitar

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this bag as a gift for my husband and it is as described. He hasn't used it yet, but I am impressed with it at first glance. The gray color is nice....still very neutral, but adds a nice pop of color vs the all black. The pocket for shoes is nice and big. I'm guessing my husband might even store his large toiletry bag in this pocket if he uses it for overnight trips. I will update after he has a chance to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but Large is quite LARGE!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality bag.. I wish it didn't collapse as easily when it's not packed full. The Large bag is too large for an everyday gym bag. A medium is recommended if you only need to hold some gym clothes, a towel, sneakers, headphones, keys, and other misc gym apparel. The large would be great for traveling, powerlifters who carry lifting belts, wraps, two pairs of sneakers, etc., and other vagabonds carry extra gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Rod

product_meta.title: Under Armour Undeniable Duffle 2.0 Gym Bag
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology delivers an element-battling, highly water-resistant finish .Tough, abrasion-resistant bottom & side panels .Large front zippered organization pocket .Adjustable, padded, HeatGear shoulder strap for total comfort .Padded top grab handle .Large vented pocket for laundry or shoes, additional large zippered pocket & one mesh pocket .D-ring on front panel for added attachment point .Dimensions: 11" x 22" x 10" .Cubic Volume: 2500 .
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology delivers an element battling, highly water resistant finish
Tough, abrasion resistant bottom & side panels
Adjustable, padded, HeatGear shoulder strap for total comfort
